Do not display this note again

data.entry: ASPI 드라이버 로드할수 없습니다! CD 리핑 불가!

entry.string: Encode to input file folder if possible

section.name: Help
section.entry: %1는 보다 많은 파일포맷을 지원하기 위해 Winamp 2 입력 플러그인을 지원합니다. %1는 이러한 파일포맷을 지원하려면, in_*.dll 파일을 %1/plugins에 복사하십시오.

entry.string: Add audio file(s) to the joblist
Add audio CD contents to the joblist
Remove the selected entry from the joblist
Start the encoding process (deleting original files)

section.name: Joblist
section.entry: 인코딩 중에는 파일을 재생할 수 없습니다!
파일재생 중에는 인코딩을 시작할 수 없습니다!
%1는 %2 개의 언어로 공개되어 있습니다. 만일 당신의 언어로 되어 있지 않다면, 'smooth Translator'를 사용하여, 쉽게 번역할 수 있습니다.
%1는 LAME, Ogg Vorbis, FAAC, 그리고 Bonk 인코더를 지원합니다. VQF포맷을 지원하는 %1 웹사이트에서 찾을 수 있습니다: %2

entry.string: Select the folder in which the encoded files will be placed
Select the folder to add to the joblist
Select the folder to add to the joblist
You did not select a track!

section.name: Submit
section.entry: 전송 전에 모든 항목과 트랙 제목을 입력하시오.

entry.string: Some error occurred trying to connect to the freedb server.
Please fill all fields and track titles before submitting.
No freedb entry for this disk.
Select the entry that best fits your CD
Would you like to perform this query again later?
Would you like to perform the remaining queries again later?
Some error occurred trying to connect to the freedb server.

section.name: Configuration
section.entry: 이 프로그램은 GNU General Public License (GPL)의 조항에 의거하여 배포되고 있습니다.

entry.string: Select the folder in which the encoded files will be placed
Use input file folder if possible
Append sequential numbers to otherwise identical filenames
The output folder does not exist! Do you want to create it?
Select the folder in which the playlist files will be placed
Create only a single playlist and/or cue sheet file per conversion
Select the folder of the CDDB database
Please enter a valid eMail address.

The freedb CDDBP protocol cannot be used over HTTP Forward proxies!
Would you like to change the protocol to HTTP?
Replace existing comments with default comment
Add reference to audio file tag
Read cue sheets embedded in metadata
Prefer cue sheets over chapter information
Prepend zero to track numbers below 10
Verify that lossless inputs decode to exactly the data they were originally created from.
Verify that lossless outputs decode to exactly the data used when encoding them.
Conversion to a single output file
Treat the combined tracks like a single track

section.name: About

entry.string: This program is being distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL).

section.entry: 이 프로그램은 GNU General Public License (GPL)의 조항에 의거하여 배포되고 있습니다.

section.name: Updates

entry.string: There are new updates for %1 available online! Would you like to see a list of available updates now?
There are no updates available at the moment!

%1 can perform an automatic check for online program updates at startup.
Would you like %1 to look for updates at startup?

section.entry: %1로 유니코드 문자를 포함한 freedb CD 데이타베이스를 전송할 수 있습니다. 그리고 비(非)라틴 아티스트나 제목의 CD를 갖고 계시면, %1를 이용하여 freedb 엔트리를 수정하여 전송할 수 있습니다.

section.name: Tips

entry.string: %1 is available in %2 languages. If your language is not available, you can easily translate %1 using the 'smooth Translator' application.

section.entry: %1로 유니코드 문자를 포함한 freedb CD 데이타베이스를 전송할 수 있습니다. 그리고 비(非)라틴 아티스트나 제목의 CD를 갖고 계시면, %1를 이용하여 freedb 엔트리를 수정하여 전송할 수 있습니다.

entry.string: %1 comes with support for the LAME, Ogg Vorbis, FAAC, FLAC and Bonk encoders. An encoder for the VQF format is available at the %1 website: %2

section.entry: 에러 정정을 위해 %1의 대화창의 CDRip 탭에서 지터 정정이 가능합니다. 또는, 파라노어 모드를 사용할 수도 있습니다.

entry.string: %1 can use Winamp 2 input plug-ins to support more file formats. Copy the in_*.dll files to the %1/plugins directory to enable %1 to read these formats.

section.entry: %1를 개선하기 위한 제안사항은 %1 SourceForge 프로젝트 페이지(%2)에 리플을 달아주시거나 %3 로 메일을 보내주십시오.

entry.string: With %1 you can submit freedb CD database entries containing Unicode characters. So if you have any CDs with non-Latin artist or title names, you can submit the correct freedb entries with %1.

section.entry: %1가 마음에 드십니까? %1는 무료이며, %1 프로젝트를 이용하여 개발하면 당신도 상용화 가능합니다. PayPal을 통하여 %2 로 송금가능합니다. 자세한 사항은 %3 을 참조하십시오.

entry.string: To correct reading errors while ripping you can enable Jitter correction in the Ripper tab of %1's configuration dialog. If that does not help, try using one of the Paranoia modes.
Do you have any suggestions on how to improve %1? You can submit any ideas through the Tracker on the %1 SourceForge project page - %2 or send an eMail to %3.
Do you like %1? %1 is available for free, but you can help fund the development by donating to the %1 project. You can send money to %2 through PayPal. See %3 for more details.

section.entry: %1에 업데이트 사항이 있습니다. 지금 업데이트 목록을 보시겠습니까?

entry.string: A conversion process is still active! Do you really want to quit?
Unable to load ASPI drivers! CD ripping disabled!
Cannot play a CD track while ripping from the same drive!
Cannot start ripping while playing a track from the same drive!

This option will remove the original files from your computer after the encoding process!
Are you sure you want to activate this function?
The output file %1 already exists! Do you want to overwrite it?
CDDB support is disabled! Please enable local or remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.
Remote CDDB support is disabled! Please enable remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

Access to CD-ROM drives was denied by Windows.
Please contact your system administrator in order to be granted the right to access the CD-ROM drive.

You seem to be converting from a lossy to a lossless format.
Please be aware that quality loss cannot be undone, so this process will not improve quality in any way, and most likely increase file size.
Would you like to continue anyway?

Checksum mismatch verifying output file: %1
Encode checksum: %2 Verify checksum: %3
The selected folder does not exist anymore!
Keep this option enabled even after restarting %1
The following %1 files already exist and will be overwritten
The selected tracks have different sample formats. Please select the desired sample format of the output file:
Read ISRC when adding tracks to joblist
Prefer cue sheet metadata over referenced files' tags
Look for compressed alternatives if referenced Wave files cannot be located
Ignore errors during cue sheet processing

section.name: Expert
section.entry: 인코딩 중에는 인코더를 설정할 수 없습니다!

entry.string: Maximum AAC frequency bandwidth to use (Hz)

section.name: Format
section.entry: ID3 태그가 포함된 AAC파일은 문제가 될 수 있습니다. 태그를 플레이어에서 사용할 경우에만, 이 옵션을 사용하기 바랍니다.

entry.string: Allow ID3v2 tags in AAC files
Some players may have problems playing AAC files with ID3 tags attached. Please use this option only if you are sure that your player can handle these tags.

section.name: Basic
section.entry: ID3 태그가 포함된 AAC파일은 문제가 될 수 있습니다. 태그를 플레이어에서 사용할 경우에만, 이 옵션을 사용하기 바랍니다.

entry.string: You can specify multiple functions separated by semicolons.
Automatically select format based on settings and input format

section.name: SndFile
section.entry: ID3 태그가 포함된 AAC파일은 문제가 될 수 있습니다. 태그를 플레이어에서 사용할 경우에만, 이 옵션을 사용하기 바랍니다.

You can also send money directly to %1 using PayPal.
